related_questions.question:
Write down the generic structure of the text about!

bantuin woi​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Generic Structure of Descriptive Text : Identification, Description

Penjelasan:

# Identification: (contains about the introduction of a person, place, animal or object will be described.)

# Description: contains a description of something such as animal, things, place or person by describing its features, forms, colors, or anything related to what the writer describe.

Jawaban:

Orientation

A mobile phone - portable radio telephone

Event

The first mobile phone - in japan

General classification

A cell phone combines - wireless communication

Description

Paragraph 2-3 is a descriptiom about phone

related_questions.question:
Monkey and crocodile    one day a monkey wanted to cross a river. he saw a crocodile in the river, so he asked the crocodile to take him across the other side. the crocodile told the monkey to jump on its back. then the crocodile swam down the river.
now, the crocodile was very hungry, so when it was in the middle of the river, it stopped and said to the monkey, "monkey, my father is very sick. he must eat the heart of the monkey. then he will be strong again."
the monkey thought for a while. then he told the crocodile to swim back to the river bank.
"what’s for?" asked the crocodile.
"because i didn’t bring my heart with me," said the monkey. "i left it under the tree, near some coconuts."
so, the crocodile turned around and swam back to the bank of the river. as soon as they reached the river bank, the monkey jumped off the crocodile’s back and climbed up to the top of a tree.
"where is your heart?" asked the crocodile.

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Monyet dan buaya

suatu hari monyet ingin menyeberangi sungai. dia melihat buaya di sungai, jadi dia meminta buaya untuk membawanya ke seberang. buaya menyuruh monyet untuk melompat di atasnya

related_questions.question:
5. Complete the table with the comparative and     superlative form
No. Adjectives Comparative Superlative
1. high
2. low
3.
thin
4.
interesting
5.
expensive​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. high (adjective)

higher (comparative)

highest (superlative)

2. low (adjective)

lower (comparative)

lowest (superlative)

3. thin (adjective)

thinner (comparative)

thinnest (superlative)

4. interesting (adjective)

more interesting (comparative)

most interesting (superlative)

5. expensive (adjective)

more expensive (comparative)

most expensive (superlative)

Semoga terbantu, maap kalo salah✌
